verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> when they had <S%G1353>passed<s%> <S%G1353>through<s%> <S%G295>Amphipolis<s%> and <S%G624>Apollonia,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2332>Thessalonica,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> was a <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews:<s%>

And <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> as his <S%G1486>manner<s%> was, <S%G1525>went<s%> in to them, and <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> days <S%G1256>reasoned<s%> with them out of the <S%G1124>scriptures,<s%>

<S%G1272>Opening<s%> and <S%G3908>alleging,<s%> that <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> needs have <S%G3958>suffered,<s%> and <S%G450>risen<s%> <S%G450>again<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead;<s%> and that <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G2605>preach<s%> to you, is <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

And <S%G5100>some<s%> of them <S%G3982>believed,<s%> and <S%G4345>consorted<s%> with <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G4609>Silas;<s%> and of the <S%G4576>devout<s%> <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude,<s%> and of the <S%G4413>chief<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> not a <S%G3641>few.<s%>

But the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> which <S%G544>believed<s%> not, <S%G2206>moved<s%> with <S%G2206>envy,<s%> <S%G4355>took<s%> to them <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4190>lewd<s%> <S%G435>fellows<s%> of the <S%G60>baser<s%> sort, and <S%G3792>gathered<s%> a <S%G3792>company,<s%> and <S%G2350>set<s%> all the <S%G4172>city<s%> on an <S%G2350>uproar,<s%> and <S%G2186>assaulted<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G2394>Jason,<s%> and <S%G2212>sought<s%> to <S%G71>bring<s%> them out to the <S%G1218>people.<s%>

And when they <S%G2147>found<s%> them not, they <S%G4951>drew<s%> <S%G2394>Jason<s%> and <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> to the <S%G4173>rulers<s%> of the <S%G4173>city,<s%> <S%G994>crying,<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> that have <S%G387>turned<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> <S%G387>upside<s%> <S%G387>down<s%> are <S%G3918>come<s%> <S%G1759>here<s%> <S%G2532>also;<s%>

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> <S%G2394>Jason<s%> has <S%G5264>received:<s%> and <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G561>contrary<s%> to the <S%G1378>decrees<s%> of <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> that there is <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G935>king,<s%> one <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
And they <S%G5015>troubled<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> and the <S%G4173>rulers<s%> of the <S%G4173>city,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things.
And when they had <S%G2983>taken<s%> <S%G2425>security<s%> of <S%G2394>Jason,<s%> and of the <S%G3062>other,<s%> they <S%G630>let<s%> them <S%G630>go.<s%>

And the <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G1599>sent<s%> <S%G1599>away<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G4609>Silas<s%> by <S%G3571>night<s%> to <S%G960>Berea:<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G3854>coming<s%> <S%G3854>thither<s%> <S%G549>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> were more <S%G2104>noble<s%> than <S%G3588>those<s%> in <S%G2332>Thessalonica,<s%> in that they <S%G1209>received<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4288>readiness<s%> of <S%G4288>mind,<s%> and <S%G350>searched<s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%> <S%G2596>daily,<s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> <S%G5023>those<s%> things were <S%G3779>so.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> of them <S%G4100>believed;<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G2158>honorable<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G1674>Greeks,<s%> and of <S%G435>men,<s%> not a <S%G3641>few.<s%>

But <S%G5613>when<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> of <S%G2332>Thessalonica<s%> had <S%G1097>knowledge<s%> that the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G2605>preached<s%> of <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G960>Berea,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1563>thither<s%> <S%G2546>also,<s%> and <S%G4531>stirred<s%> up the <S%G3793>people.<s%>

And <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G1821>sent<s%> <S%G1821>away<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> as it were to the <S%G2281>sea:<s%> but <S%G4609>Silas<s%> and <S%G5095>Timotheus<s%> <S%G5278>stayed<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> still.

And they that <S%G2525>conducted<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> him to <S%G116>Athens:<s%> and <S%G2983>receiving<s%> a <S%G1785>commandment<s%> to <S%G4609>Silas<s%> and <S%G5095>Timotheus<s%> for to <S%G2064>come<s%> to him with <S%G5613>all<s%> <S%G5033><s%> <S%G5613>speed,<s%> <S%G5033><s%> they <S%G1826>departed.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> while <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1551>waited<s%> for them <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G116>Athens,<s%> his <S%G4151>spirit<s%> was <S%G3947>stirred<s%> in him, when he <S%G2334>saw<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> wholly given to <S%G2712>idolatry.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G1256>disputed<s%> he in the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> with the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> and with the <S%G4576>devout<s%> persons, and in the <S%G58>market<s%> <S%G2596>daily<s%> with them that <S%G3909>met<s%> with him.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5386>philosophers<s%> of the <S%G1946>Epicureans,<s%> and of the <S%G4770>Stoicks,<s%> <S%G4820>encountered<s%> him. And <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4691>babbler<s%> <S%G3004>say?<s%> other <S%G3588>some,<s%> He <S%G1380>seems<s%> to be a <S%G2604>setter<s%> <S%G2604>forth<s%> of <S%G3581>strange<s%> <S%G1140>gods:<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G2097>preached<s%> to them <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and the <S%G386>resurrection.<s%>

And they <S%G1949>took<s%> him, and <S%G71>brought<s%> him to <S%G697>Areopagus,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1410>May<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine,<s%> whereof you <S%G2980>speak,<s%> is?

For you <S%G1533>bring<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3579>strange<s%> things to our <S%G189>ears:<s%> we would <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G2309>mean.<s%> <S%G1511><s%>

(For <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G117>Athenians<s%> and <S%G3581>strangers<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G1927>there<s%> <S%G2119>spent<s%> their <S%G2119>time<s%> in <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G2087>else,<s%> but <S%G2228>either<s%> to <S%G3004>tell,<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> thing.)

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of <S%G697>Mars'<s%> <S%G697>hill,<s%> and <S%G5346>said,<s%> You <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G117>Athens,<s%> I <S%G2334>perceive<s%> that in <S%G3956>all<s%> things you are <S%G1174>too<s%> <S%G1174>superstitious.<s%>

For as I <S%G1330>passed<s%> by, and <S%G333>beheld<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4574>devotions,<s%> I <S%G2147>found<s%> an <S%G1041>altar<s%> with <S%G3739>this<s%> <S%G1924>inscription,<s%> TO THE <S%G57>UNKNOWN<s%> <S%G2316>GOD.<s%> <S%G3739>Whom<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> you <S%G50>ignorantly<s%> <S%G2151>worship,<s%> him <S%G2605>declare<s%> I to you.

<S%G2316>God<s%> that <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G1722>therein,<s%> <S%G846><s%> seeing that he is <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2730>dwells<s%> not in <S%G3485>temples<s%> <S%G5499>made<s%> with <S%G5499>hands;<s%>

<S%G3761>Neither<s%> is <S%G2323>worshipped<s%> with <S%G444>men's<s%> <S%G5495>hands,<s%> as though he <S%G4326>needed<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing, seeing he <S%G1325>gives<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> and <S%G4157>breath,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> things;

And has <S%G4160>made<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> for to <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and has <S%G3724>determined<s%> the <S%G2540>times<s%> <S%G4384>before<s%> <S%G4384>appointed,<s%> and the <S%G3734>bounds<s%> of their <S%G2733>habitation;<s%>

That they should <S%G2212>seek<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G686>haply<s%> they might <S%G5584>feel<s%> after him, and <S%G2147>find<s%> him, <S%G2544>though<s%> he be not <S%G3112>far<s%> from <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of us:

For in him we <S%G2198>live,<s%> and <S%G2795>move,<s%> and have our <S%G2070>being;<s%> as <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G2596>your<s%> <S%G5209><s%> <S%G2596>own<s%> <S%G4163>poets<s%> have <S%G2046>said,<s%> For we are <S%G2532>also<s%> his <S%G1085>offspring.<s%>

For as much <S%G3767>then<s%> as we are the <S%G1085>offspring<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> we <S%G3784>ought<s%> not to <S%G3543>think<s%> that the <S%G2304>Godhead<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> to <S%G5557>gold,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G696>silver,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3037>stone,<s%> <S%G5480>graven<s%> by <S%G5078>are<s%> and <S%G444>man's<s%> <S%G1761>device.<s%>

And the <S%G5550>times<s%> of <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G52>ignorance<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5237>winked<s%> at; but <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G3853>commands<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3837>every<s%> <S%G3837>where<s%> to <S%G3340>repent:<s%>

<S%G1360>Because<s%> he has <S%G2476>appointed<s%> a <S%G2250>day,<s%> in the <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> in <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> by that <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he has <S%G3724>ordained;<s%> whereof he has <S%G3930>given<s%> <S%G4102>assurance<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> men, in that he has <S%G450>raised<s%> him from the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

And when they <S%G191>heard<s%> of the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G3588>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G5512>mocked:<s%> and <S%G3588>others<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> We will <S%G191>hear<s%> you <S%G3825>again<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> matter.
<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1831>departed<s%> from <S%G3319>among<s%> them.

However, <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G2853>joined<s%> to him, and <S%G4100>believed:<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G1354>Dionysius<s%> the <S%G698>Areopagite,<s%> and a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G1152>Damaris,<s%> and <S%G2087>others<s%> with them.
